mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.imgUrl, p.disc, p.price, p.createDate, s.id "stockId", s.productId, s.count FROM product p INNER JOIN stock s ON p.id = s.productId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(name, imgUrl, disc, price,createDate) VALUES(#{name},#{imgUrl},#{disc},#{price},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name} , imgUrl = #{imgUrl}, disc = #{disc}, price = #{price} WHERE id = #{id}
